scripts.postinstall: npm run install:config && npm run install:config-react && npm run install:config-prettier
scripts.install:config: cd packages/eslint-config-finn && npm prune && npm install
scripts.install:config-react: cd packages/eslint-config-finn-react && npm prune && npm install
scripts.install:config-prettier: cd packages/eslint-config-finn-prettier && npm prune && npm install
scripts.test: eslint . && node test/config-test.js && npm run test:finn && npm run test:finn-react && npm run test:finn-prettier
